facts.text: Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood!
A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance'!
Honey never spoils. Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old!
A single cloud can weigh more than a million pounds!
There are more possible games of chess than atoms in the observable universe!
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren't!
The shortest war in history was between Britain and Zanzibar in 1896. It lasted only 38 minutes!
A group of pandas is called an 'embarrassment'!
The human brain uses about 20% of the body's total energy!
Dolphins have names for each other - they use unique whistle signatures!
A single strand of spaghetti is called a 'spaghetto'!
The Great Wall of China isn't visible from space with the naked eye!
Sharks are older than trees - they've been around for about 400 million years!
A group of crows is called a 'murder'!
The longest recorded flight of a chicken is 13 seconds!
Your nose can remember up to 50,000 different scents!
A group of owls is called a 'parliament'!
The human body produces about 25 million new cells every second!
Butterflies taste with their feet!
A group of rhinos is called a 'crash'!
